name: Ghosts Aren't Real?
description:
🕹️How to Play
  • WASD / Arrows to move
  • Left mouse click (+ drag) to move the camera around -
  • Mouse scroll for Zooming in/out
  • Right Mouse Click or Press "E" to Scare / Interact
👻About

You are a sad ghost that is happy when he scares others.

Don't let your happiness reach zero! Scare as many people as possible!

⭐Team
